statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Rift Valley coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.40} per pound with some Ethiopian coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${13.70} per pound to create \displaystyle{90} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${12.38} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
